title: NeuroEM Therapeutics appoints Dr. W. Scott Burgin as Chief Medical Officer
summary: NeuroEM Therapeutics, a clinical-stage biotechnology company developing non-drug bioengineered approaches to cognitive decline and Alzheimer’s disease, announced the appointment of Dr. W. Scott Burgin, MD, as its first Chief Medical Officer (CMO). Dr. Burgin has been a long-time medical advisor to NeuroEM prior to this role, and brings decades of experience in neurology, clinical care, […] The post NeuroEM Therapeutics appoints Dr. W.
